author: Flatsiedatsie
description: Turn a Pi into a smart doorbell or security camera
name: Candle cam

Interval.description: How many seconds between changing to another random photo.

Use microphone.description: Should audio also be recorded and transmitted? This may clash with other installed addons that also require access to the microphone, such as Voco.

Use ramdrive.description: To save wear and tear of your SD card, a 50Mb ramdrive will be created if enough free memory (at least 80Mb) is available. Try disabling this if you are experiencing issues with stability (which a lack of memory can cause).

Contain.description: If enabled, pictures will be shown in full, with black bars around them. If disabled, they will fit the screen fully, but parts may be cut-off.

Clock.description: Show the time on top of the video.

Debug.description: Enable this to see much more detail in the internal WebThings Gateway log about what this add-on is doing.
